articles.title: Bouncer rule was introduced to limit success of black team: Darren Sammy - The Indian Express
articles.description: Darren Sammy points out how cricket had no bouncer rule when white fast bowlers were ruling the roost but instituted a rule to limit bouncers when black fast bowlers were the most feared.
